name: HT CM
description:
> *We are all. We are nothing. We are the thread that binds every eon. We cannot be undone. What began as void shall return to it.*

We will be tackling by far one of the most difficult encounters in the game, <:dragonvoid:954126378473767032> **Harvest Temple CM**. This is a long and punishing encounter that requires everyone to come well-prepared.

Power DPS is **required** for this encounter. This is because the boss has significantly lower toughness than other bosses, and the instance is at night, meaning that `Superior Sigil of the Night` can be used for a further 10% DPS.

The <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Heal Alacrity**, <:quick_dps:1176639849156051014> **DPS Quickness**, and <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Portal** players will be doing the `Greens` mechanic, which involves standing in the greens that spawn throughout the fight before they pop to avoid a squad-wide downstate.

A wide variety of builds are possible for this encounter, but here are our recommendations:

<:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Heal Alacrity Builds:**
- <:specter:948585463415992335> [**Specter**](https://tinyurl.com/ydbzp44n)
- <:mechanist:948585084842287184> [**Mechanist**](https://tinyurl.com/4kuha4yr)
- <:chronomancer:763700489467592734> [**Chronomancer**](https://tinyurl.com/mvzdfsd8)

<:quick_dps:1176639849156051014> **DPS Quickness Builds:**
- <:herald:818773507286499328> [**Herald**](https://tinyurl.com/4enbu2y4)

<:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Portal Builds**:
- <:virtuoso:948585484165210162> [**Virtuoso**](https://tinyurl.com/3ywdm4ku) (ðŸŽ¥ [Rotation Video](https://youtu.be/EAlaf3Bkzvc))
- <:chronomancer:763700489467592734> [**Chronomancer**](https://tinyurl.com/56efxv7u)

<:vindicator:948585284931555428> **Venticator Build**:
- <:vindicator:948585284931555428> [**Vindicator**](https://tinyurl.com/yhnuxrmx) (ðŸŽ¥ [Rotation Video](https://youtu.be/ayXWAoG5d3g))

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS Builds:**
- <:reaper:839262566168657961> [**Reaper**](https://tinyurl.com/mwc4cdfd)
- <:vindicator:948585284931555428> [**Vindicator**](https://tinyurl.com/bddn93yu)
- <:holosmith:766682587652554814> [**Holosmith**](https://tinyurl.com/4zr4ed8y)
- <:soulbeast:818775299805413386> [**Soulbeast**](https://tinyurl.com/bddn93yu)

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- Both healers will need to take the **Red Kiter** role. This is a role that requires healers to be closest to the middle of the arena at certain points in the fight to pick up the `Reds` so that they can drop them away from the group.

<:quick_dps:1176639849156051014> <:alac_dps:1176639831720337438> **Quickness Roles:**
- Both quickness providers need to provide <:stability:844163847161774121> **Stability** for certain mobs and boss attacks throughout the fight.

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS Roles:**
- One DPS will take the <:vindicator:948585284931555428> **Venticator** role. This requires them to come on a <:vindicator:948585284931555428> **Vindicator** build with the `Legendary Centaur Stance` (Ventari) for the dome.
- Another DPS should take the <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Portal + Mass Invis** role. This is a role that requires you to come on a <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Mesmer** DPS build with `Blink` and `Portal`, mainly for greens. You will also be taking `Mass Invisibility` and casting it between phases to allow mobs to run to the stack.
- Another DPS should take <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Portal + Moa**, which is similar to the above role except with `Signet of Humility` as your elite for CC.

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: This template for a <:dragonvoid:954126378473767032> **Harvest Temple CM** run stresses the difficulty of the encounter. It has build recommendations for all the roles and comes with standard **Red Kiter**, **Stability**, <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Portal + Mass Invis**, <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Portal + Moa**, and <:vindicator:948585284931555428> **Venticator** roles.
